P D  [ধাপ (১) থেকে]  ∴ B C 2 = C P 2 + A P 2 − 2 A P ⋅ P D [ ∵ P , A B  এর মধ্যবিন্দু  তাই  A P = P B ] \begin{array}{l} \therefore \mathrm{AC}^{2}=\mathrm{CD}^{2}+\mathrm{AD}^{2} \text{[[পিথাগোরাসের উপপাদ্য]]}\\ =C D^{2}+(\mathrm{AP}+\mathrm{PD})^{2} \\ =\mathrm{CD}^{2}+\mathrm{AP}^{2}+2 \mathrm{AP} \cdot \mathrm{PD}+\mathrm{PD}^{2} \\ =C D^{2}+\mathrm{PD}^{2}+\mathrm{AP}^{2}+2 \mathrm{AP} . \mathrm{PD} \\ \therefore \mathrm{AC}^{2}=\mathrm{CP}^{2}+\mathrm{AP}^{2}+2 \mathrm{AP} . \mathrm{PD} \text { [ধাপ (১) হতে] } \\ \text { (৩) } \triangle \mathrm{CBD}-А \mathrm{CDB}=90^{\circ} \text { এবং অতিভুজ } \mathrm{BC} \\ \therefore \mathrm{BC}^{2}=\mathrm{CD}^{2}+\mathrm{DB}^{2} \\ =\mathrm{CD}^{2}+(\mathrm{PB}-\mathrm{PD})^{2} \\ =\mathrm{CD}^{2}+\mathrm{PB}^{2}-2 \cdot \mathrm{~PB} \cdot \mathrm{PD}+\mathrm{PD}^{2} \\ =\mathrm{CD}^{2}+\mathrm{PD}^{2}+\mathrm{PB}^{2}-2 \mathrm{~PB} . \mathrm{PD} \\ =\mathrm{CP}^{2}+\mathrm{PB}^{2}-2 \mathrm{~PB} . \mathrm{PD} \quad \text { [ধাপ (১) থেকে] } \\ \therefore \mathrm{BC}^{2}=\mathrm{CP}^{2}+\mathrm{AP}^{2}-2 \mathrm{AP} \cdot \mathrm{PD} \quad[\because \mathrm{P}, \mathrm{AB} \text { এর মধ্যবিন্দু } \text { তাই } \mathrm{AP}=\mathrm{PB}] \end{array} ∴ AC 2 = CD 2 + AD 2 [[ পিথাগোরাসের   উপপাদ্য ]] = C D 2 + ( AP + PD ) 2 = CD 2 + AP 2 + 2 AP ⋅ PD + PD 2 = C D 2 + PD 2 + AP 2 + 2 AP .
